lead_paragraph: Aston Villa's battle for survival at the foot of the Premier League still looked a hopeless one after they could only scrape a point from a grim goalless derby at the Hawthorns on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Villa Still Helpless After Hopeless Derby Draw
headline.main: Villa Still Helpless After Hopeless Derby Draw

snippet: Aston Villa's battle for survival at the foot of the Premier League still looked a hopeless one after they could only scrape a point from a grim goalless derby at the Hawthorns on Saturday....
